sentences.en: Generally, Scarlett would not have cared whether she received at Melly's piddling parties or not.
sentences.cn: 在通常情况下, 思嘉并不在意是否在媚兰举办的家宴上参加接待客人.

sentences.en: I don't want to hear all the piddling little details!
sentences.cn: 我不想听那些琐碎的事!

sentences.en: It was an effort, though a piddling one.
sentences.cn: 虽然微不足道,但这毕竟是一种努力.

sentences.en: It's annoying to have to get authorization for spending such piddling amounts of money.
sentences.cn: 花这麽一点钱也要去请示,真烦人.

sentences.en: Only then will I feel it's right . To hell with that piddling propaganda job!
sentences.cn: 滚它的宣传科小干事吧,我要干这一行.

sentences.en: They are arguing over piddling amounts of money.
sentences.cn: 他们在为一点小钱争吵。

sentences.en: Why don't you get on withwork instead of piddling away the whole morning doing nothing?
sentences.cn: 你难道不能找点事做做,而不是整个上午闲混过去 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 撒尿；鬼混；挑食；做无聊事
琐屑的；无用的；不重要的

trans.tran_cn: 撒尿，鬼混，游荡( piddle的现在分词 )
